text: Upstairs and Downstairs is a 1959 British comedy drama movie. It was directed by Ralph Thomas. The movie is based on the book by Ronald Scott Thorn. Actors included Michael Craig, Anne Heywood, James Robertson Justice, Sid James, Claudia Cardinale, Daniel Massey, Reginald Beckwith, Susan Hampshire, and Oliver Reed. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 comedy-drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Ralph Thomas
title: Upstairs and Downstairs
